name: Split Cube (itch)
description:
A 3D game in which you dash into enemies and parkour over seperatable blocks

 Controls :

 W,A,S,D to move

 Space to jump

 Right click to aim

 Left click to dash

 E to seperate blocks

 Shift for SPEED

 Made for the GDevelop game jam 3

 Sound effects made by : https://itch.io/profile/ayitzmatt
